head.title: Beaumont Inn Smoked Sausage and Mushrooms

ing.item: Fresh; ground smoked Sausage cooked and drained

directions.step:
Recipe by: Beaumont Inn
Cook mushrooms at 350 degrees for 7 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix cooled sausage, cream cheese, and Parmesan. Fill each mushroom with 1 teaspoon of filling. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 minutes.
Note: If ground smoked sausage isn't available you can add 1/2 teaspoon of a liquid natural smoke product (like Wright's) to 1/2 pound ground pork (not pork sausage).
